comment: Easy online class! Sometimes it is a lot of work, but as long as you do it the class is an easy A. The tests are a little tough, but I recommend taking this class online! She is a very nice and helpful professor.

This class was not as easy as I thought it would have been. There was a midterm as well as a final. There is a lot of reading and videos that you have to take notes on. There is no review guides for the the two exams. I made an A but it was, by no means, an easy A.Good Luck.

She is a great professor. She is helpful and clear on what she wants you to do. She demands a lot of work but she grades fairly. The midterm and final can be difficult so study! They are very similar though. A lot of outside reading though, make sure to take notes on them. You watch a lot of videos. Make sure to take notes on them also.

Dr. Foote is a great first year teacher. She makes sure that the class is following along, as well as getting to know each student. The class consists mainly of group work, and discussion. Speak up! She creates awkwards silences if you don't. She grades fairly, and is extremely friendly. The books were used quite frequently.
EASY CLASS..we did 2 projects and the rest of the time we had pointless class discussions and presenters.
I took the hybrid which I highly recommend. Really nice class and she's a great teacher. No tests or quizzes. Very easy to talk to and just a nice person in general.
THE BEST TEACHER EVER!! doesnt give test just group projects which makes the class better anyways!! she is so cool! very laid back!! EASY but keeps you interest!! TAKE HER!!
